text: GRK Varaždin is a Croatian handball team from Varaždin. Their home matches are played at the Športska dvorana Varaždin. They compete in Dukat Premijer liga. ==European record == {| class="wikitable" ! Season ! Competition ! Round ! Club ! 1st leg ! 2nd leg !
